review_title: Deceptive, No sense of direction or leadership, unethical decisions at times
pros: Good people do work there, location is convenient and there is parking, the job itself is interesting and you will learn but the politics are hard to avoid, watching students grow and learn to become talented culinary professionals
cons: Lack of direction and transparency, often the blame game is used to 'solve' problems, the high turnover rate is unsettling, job security is often the lunchroom discussion. They overwork people and the job suffocates people and teams in the process

pros: You can eat good food and u r around chefs & culinary students so that's cool.
cons: Le Cordon Bleu Ottawa is a big mess. Toxic environment, management is a joke, bad attitude... been going on a long time & getting worse. Staff are all unhappy and good people are always going out the door. Hard work & effort are not recognized. You like politics? This might be 4 u! Otherwise run!!
